definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: I hope you enjoy the farewell waltz.
sentences.chinese: 希望你們享受這個告別的華爾茲。

sentences.english: She danced the waltz with me.
The result is both realistic and hallucinatory.
sentences.chinese: 《和巴什爾跳華爾茲》也是警醒觀衆的噩夢。

sentences.english: The waltz is a beautiful dance.
sentences.chinese: 華爾茲舞是一種優美的舞。

sentences.english: How many waltzes did John Strauss the younger write?
sentences.chinese: 小約翰施特勞斯寫了多少首華爾茲曲？

sentences.english: I remember the night and the "Tennessee Waltz.
sentences.chinese: 我記得那一夜和那首田納西華爾茲。
你看他跳華爾茲，滑溜溜的，像綢緞一樣。

sentences.english: Sorry, I'm engaged for the foxtrot. Will the next Walts be all right?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，狐步舞已經有約了，下個華爾茲行嗎？

sentences.english: This is a picture of some young people dancing the waltz .
sentences.chinese: 這是一張青年人跳華爾茲舞的圖片。

sentences.english: I danced with you to the last piece of music of waltz.
sentences.chinese: 我與你，跳了最後這一曲華爾茲。

sentences.english: Waltz, nymph, for quick jigs vex Bud.
sentences.chinese: 女神，輕快的華爾茲激怒了巴德。

sentences.english: Giants have even been known to waltz down the street together.
sentences.chinese: 那些巨人雕像甚至被一起帶到街上跳華爾茲。

sentences.english: She waltzed lightly around the room.
sentences.chinese: 她輕盈地在房間跳著華爾茲。

definition: hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
The Sound of Music, Broadway musical (1959) and Academy Award-winning movie (1965)
Elvis Presley (1935-1977), US pop singer and film star/transliterated as 埃爾維斯·普雷斯利|埃尔维斯·普雷斯利[Ai1 er3 wei2 si1 · Pu3 lei2 si1 li4]
